note.p: Death: Tramore, County Waterford, Ireland (11 July 1803)
Burial: Roman Catholic church at Waterford, County Waterford, Ireland

Career: Admitted to the penitential monastery, La Trappe; Pope ordered him to leave and enter the service of the King of Spain; ordained (1769); Chaplain to the Spanish Embassy, London (from 1769) and Head and Rector of the Spanish Church there; regarded as the founder of St James' Church, Spanish Place, London; President of the Royal Catholic College, Maynooth (1795); Roman Catholic Bishop of Waterford and Lismore
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Leaflet, St James' Church, Spanish Place
